channel.title: Changing the look of an npc?
channel.description:
Hello guys, I have a small problem (at-least i think it's small)
Here is Aubury (the runeshop guy):
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/aubskillcape.gif[/img]
Notice he has the runecrafting skillcape.
How do i change an npc's look? Say if i wanted to make an npc that looked like this:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/npcool.gif[/img]
How would i do it?
some1 plz help!
